# Hakka Kitchen Restaurant Website

## Business Overview
Hakka Kitchen is an authentic Indian and Hakka cuisine restaurant located in Okotoks, Alberta, Canada. We specialize in traditional Indian dishes alongside Hakka and Nepali-style cuisine prepared with bold spices and authentic cooking techniques. Our restaurant offers dine-in, takeout, and catering services, featuring signature dishes like Chicken Tikka Masala, Goat Rara, Butter Prawn, and more.

## Location & Contact Information
- **Address**: 100 Stockton Ave, Okotoks, AB T1S 0A1, Canada
- **Phone**: +1 587-971-7411
- **Geographic Coordinates**: 50.7199280134305, -113.95499967270565
- **Website**: https://hakkakitchenrestaurant.com
- **Online Ordering**: https://orders.iorders.online/hakka-kitchen-okotoks-5205
- **Google Maps**: https://maps.app.goo.gl/JsTmaQcbYhdEuwTN7

## Operating Hours
- **Monday**: Closed
- **Tuesday - Thursday**: 11:30 AM - 9:00 PM
- **Friday**: 11:30 AM - 10:00 PM
- **Saturday**: 10:00 AM - 10:00 PM
- **Sunday**: 10:00 AM - 9:00 PM

## Service Areas in Okotoks

### Primary Delivery Areas
- Cimarron
- Drake Landing
- Downtown Okotoks
- Downey
- Westmount
- Westridge
- Mountain View
- Sandstone

### Secondary Delivery Areas
- Crystal Shores
- Sheep River
- Sheep River Heights
- Sheep River Cove
- Hunters Glen
- Rosemount

## Key Features & Services

### Restaurant Services
- Dine-in restaurant with authentic atmosphere
- Takeout and delivery services
- Catering for events and special occasions
- Online ordering system via iOrders
- Phone orders and reservations

### Cuisine Specialties
- Authentic Indian dishes
- Hakka cuisine (Indo-Chinese fusion)
- Nepali-style specialties
- Traditional tandoori cooking
- Aromatic biryanis
- Fresh-baked naan and breads
- Rich curries and gravies
- Vegetarian options available

### Recommended Signature Dishes
1. **Chicken Tikka Masala** - Our most popular dish featuring tender chicken in rich tomato cream sauce
2. **Goat Rara** - Nepali-style goat curry with bold spices (dairy-free)
3. **Butter Prawn** - Premium seafood specialty in creamy butter sauce
4. **Chilly Chicken** - Indo-Chinese fusion appetizer with spicy flavor
5. **Lamb Curry** - Traditional lamb preparation with authentic spices
6. **Butter Chicken with Naan** - Classic combination of creamy curry and fresh-baked bread

## Website Structure

### Main Pages
- **Home** (index.html): Main landing page showcasing restaurant highlights, popular dishes, service areas, and location
- **Menu** (menu.html): Complete menu with categories, dishes, and online ordering integration
- **About** (about.html): Restaurant story, cuisine philosophy, and mission
- **Our Food** (our-food.html): Photo gallery of authentic Indian and Hakka dishes
- **Contact Us** (contact-us.html): Location map, hours, phone number, and address

### SEO & Information Pages
- **Okotoks Indian Restaurant** (okotoks-indian-restaurant.html): Local SEO landing page

### Service Pages
- **Indian Food Delivery Okotoks** (tags/indian-food-delivery-okotoks.html): Delivery service information
- **Indian Food Takeout Okotoks** (tags/indian-food-takeout-okotoks.html): Takeout service information

### Dish-Specific Landing Pages
- Chicken Tikka Masala Okotoks (tags/dishes/chicken-tikka-masala-okotoks.html)
- Goat Rara Okotoks (tags/dishes/goat-rara-okotoks.html)
- Butter Prawn Okotoks (tags/dishes/butter-prawn-okotoks.html)
- Chilly Chicken Okotoks (tags/dishes/chilly-chicken-okotoks.html)
- Lamb Curry Okotoks (tags/dishes/lamb-curry-okotoks.html)
- Butter Chicken with Naan Okotoks (tags/dishes/butter-chicken-naan-okotoks.html)

### Location-Specific Landing Pages
Each Okotoks neighborhood has a dedicated delivery landing page:
- Cimarron (tags/places/cimarron-delivery-from-hakka-kitchen.html)
- Drake Landing (tags/places/drake-landing-delivery-from-hakka-kitchen.html)
- Downtown Okotoks (tags/places/downtown-okotoks-delivery-from-hakka-kitchen.html)
- Downey (tags/places/downey-delivery-from-hakka-kitchen.html)
- Westmount (tags/places/westmount-delivery-from-hakka-kitchen.html)
- Westridge (tags/places/westridge-delivery-from-hakka-kitchen.html)
- Mountain View (tags/places/mountain-view-delivery-from-hakka-kitchen.html)
- Sandstone (tags/places/sandstone-delivery-from-hakka-kitchen.html)
- Crystal Shores (tags/places/crystal-shores-delivery-from-hakka-kitchen.html)
- Sheep River (tags/places/sheep-river-delivery-from-hakka-kitchen.html)
- Sheep River Heights (tags/places/sheep-river-heights-delivery-from-hakka-kitchen.html)
- Sheep River Cove (tags/places/sheep-river-cove-delivery-from-hakka-kitchen.html)
- Hunters Glen (tags/places/hunters-glen-delivery-from-hakka-kitchen.html)
- Rosemount (tags/places/rosemount-delivery-from-hakka-kitchen.html)

### Legal Pages
- Privacy Policy (privacy-policy.html)
- Terms of Use (terms-of-use.html)

## Technical Implementation

### Frontend Technologies
- HTML5 semantic markup
- CSS3 with responsive design
- JavaScript for interactivity
- Component-based architecture with dynamic ROOT_PATH replacement
- Dynamic header and footer components (components.js)

### Assets Organization
- Images optimized in WebP format
- Categorized asset folders (gallery, banners, backgrounds, logo, favicon)
- Responsive image loading with proper srcset attributes
- Preloaded critical images for performance

### SEO Features
- Semantic HTML structure with proper heading hierarchy (H1, H2, H3, H4)
- Meta descriptions optimized (150-160 characters)
- Title tags optimized (50-60 characters)
- Open Graph tags for social media sharing
- Twitter Card integration
- Canonical URLs for all pages
- Structured data markup (Schema.org):
  - Restaurant schema with complete NAP (Name, Address, Phone)
  - LocalBusiness schema
  - BreadcrumbList schema
  - FAQPage schema
  - ContactPage schema
  - AboutPage schema
  - ImageGallery schema
  - Menu schema
- XML Sitemap (sitemap.xml)
- Robots.txt for crawler guidance
- Geo-positioning meta tags for local SEO
- Google Maps iframe integration

### Performance Optimizations
- WebP image format for faster loading
- Component-based architecture for code reusability
- Responsive images with proper width/height attributes
- Optimized meta viewport settings for mobile
- Minimal external dependencies
- Lazy loading implementation
- Preload directives for critical assets

## Content Guidelines

### Brand Voice
- Authentic and welcoming tone
- Emphasis on traditional cooking techniques
- Focus on bold spices and fresh ingredients
- Highlighting Hakka and Nepali-style specialties
- Family-friendly and community-oriented

### Key Messaging
- "Authentic Indian & Hakka Restaurant in Okotoks"
- Traditional Indian flavors with freshly prepared meals
- Bold spices and authentic cooking techniques
- Signature dishes: Chicken Tikka Masala, Goat Rara, Butter Prawn
- Serving Okotoks neighborhoods with quality cuisine
- Dine-in, takeout, and catering available

## User Experience Features

### Navigation
- Clear menu structure with consistent navigation
- Quick access to online ordering
- Easy-to-find contact information and hours
- Mobile-responsive design for all devices
- Breadcrumb navigation on all pages
- Floating "Order Online" button for conversion

### Interactive Elements
- Google Maps integration for directions
- Online ordering via iOrders platform
- Image galleries showcasing dishes
- Social media meta tags for sharing
- Click-to-call phone links
- Direct links to Google Maps location

## Business Objectives
1. Build strong local SEO presence in Okotoks and surrounding neighborhoods
2. Drive online orders through iOrders integration
3. Highlight signature dishes and authentic cooking techniques
4. Promote delivery and takeout services to all Okotoks areas
5. Provide easy access to menu and ordering information
6. Establish brand as premier Indian and Hakka restaurant in Okotoks
7. Facilitate customer contact via phone for reservations and catering

## Target Audience
- Okotoks residents in all neighborhoods
- Indian food enthusiasts seeking authentic cuisine
- Hakka cuisine fans (Indo-Chinese fusion lovers)
- Families looking for dining and takeout options
- Corporate clients for catering services
- Food delivery customers in Okotoks area
- People searching for specific dishes (Tikka Masala, Goat Rara, etc.)
- Diners seeking traditional and Nepali-style Indian food

## Unique Selling Points
- Authentic Indian, Hakka, and Nepali-style cuisine
- Bold spices and traditional cooking techniques
- Signature dishes: Chicken Tikka Masala, Goat Rara, Butter Prawn
- Fresh-baked naan and tandoori specialties
- Convenient Okotoks location (100 Stockton Ave)
- Delivery to all major Okotoks neighborhoods
- Professional catering services
- Online ordering via iOrders platform
- Family-owned and operated with authentic recipes

## Content Management
- Regular menu updates
- Seasonal specials and promotions
- Gallery updates with new dish photos
- Service area expansion updates
- Operating hours clearly displayed
- Consistent NAP (Name, Address, Phone) across all pages

## Technical Notes for AI Agents
- All component HTML files use ROOT_PATH placeholder for dynamic path resolution
- Header component (components/header.html) includes navigation and branding
- Footer component (components/footer.html) includes hours, address, phone, and legal links
- All pages follow consistent SEO structure with proper schema markup
- Location pages target specific Okotoks neighborhoods for local SEO
- Dish pages target specific menu items for search visibility
- Mobile-first responsive design approach
- No reservation.html or enquiry.html pages exist in this implementation
